nodes.text: The Bar Jaraniz tapcaf on Nar Shaddaa served an elaborate cocktail as part of the seedy establishment's selection of beverages. The cocktail was crafted using a number of fruit segments, several skewers, and a measure of sky-blue, two-hundred-proof vosh poured from a bottle laden with lumps of floating geref. Bar Jaraniz's bartender was versed in creating the cocktail at his customers' request, and did so for one patron in the year 24 ABY.

The elaborate cocktail served at Bar Jaraniz was first introduced to the Star Wars universe in the New Jedi Order era e-novella entitled Boba Fett: A Practical Man, written by author Karen Traviss and published in August, 2006.
